body_html:
Hmm...the learn_runner interface isn't really part of the documented API on www.tensorflow.org/api_docs. Perhaps we shouldn't be using it.

CCing @jhseu @martinwicke who might have comments on what to use instead and also whether and how the CloudML documentation should be updated.
body_text:
Hmm...the learn_runner interface isn't really part of the documented API on www.tensorflow.org/api_docs. Perhaps we shouldn't be using it.
CCing @jhseu @martinwicke  who might have comments on what to use instead and also whether and how the CloudML documentation should be updated.
body:
Hmm...the `learn_runner` interface isn't really part of the documented API on www.tensorflow.org/api_docs. Perhaps we shouldn't be using it.

CCing @jhseu @martinwicke  who might have comments on what to use instead and also whether and how the CloudML documentation should be updated.
